title: Enchanting Vanamala Necklace with Emeralds, Rubies, and Diamonds
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality emeralds (panchala pachalu)
features: Floral-inspired design with intricately crafted petals and vine-like details. The emeralds are set in a bezel setting for a secure and elegant look. Rubies are clustered to resemble small flowers, adding a touch of vibrant color. The diamonds create a sparkling halo around the gemstones, enhancing their brilliance. The gold chain features a sleek, modern design.
occasions: and other special occasions. It also makes a stunning statement piece for contemporary events and parties.
description: This Vanamala Necklace blends traditional South Indian jewelry design with a contemporary aesthetic. The use of emeralds, rubies, and diamonds is considered auspicious, making it ideal for significant life events. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting beauty and durability. This is a timeless piece that will be cherished for generations.
